mix

public static final float mix(float pX,
                              float pY,
                              float pMix)
Parameters:
pX -
pY -
pMix - [0...1]
Returns:
pX * (1 - pMix) + pY * pMix

public static final int mix(int pX,
                            int pY,
                            float pMix)
Parameters:
pX -
pY -
pMix - [0...1]
Returns:
